DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study : - establish etiology acute aseptic meningitis/meningoencephalitis Slovenia - assess clinical course outcome tick-borne encephalitis Lyme neuroborreliosis - characterize inflammatory protein , gene polymorphism , transcriptome profile patient tick-borne encephalitis Lyme neuroborreliosis
DOC.criteria: clinical picture compatible aseptic meningitis/meningoencephalitis age 18 year old clear cerebrospinal fluid macroscopic examination cerebrospinal pleocytosis ( > 5 x 106 white blood cell per liter ) young 18 year pregnant woman
